text: A drive-through or drive-thru is a way of achieving quick service, particularly at restaurants. There are also drive-throughs at other places, such as banks or coffee shops. ==Examples== * Alcohol at a drive-through liquor store * Banking services at a drive-through bank * Coffee at a drive- through coffee shop * Dairy products at a drive-through dairy store (notably the Skinner Dairy shops of North-East Florida) * Drugs at a drive-through pharmacy * Food or drink at a drive-through restaurant (typically fast food) * Marriage (primarily at special drive-through marriage chapels in Las Vegas in the United States) Category:Buildings and structures
title: Drive-through
